alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 7:52PM EDT until June 16 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 751 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brookdale, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, St. Matthews, Holly Hill, Branchville, Summerton, Bowman, Elloree, Santee State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Orangeburg County Airport, Edisto Gardens, Santee, Cameron, Eutawville, Rowesville, Vance and Cordova. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 143 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 117. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
